Uses of Package
org.smpp

  • Packages that use org.smpp 
    Package Description
    org.smpp  
    org.smpp.pdu  
    org.smpp.pdu.tlv  
    org.smpp.util  
  • Classes in org.smpp used by org.smpp 
    Class and Description
    Connection
    Abstract class defining necessary abstract methods for communication over socket based network communication interface.
    NotSynchronousException
    Exception NotSynchronousException is thrown when Session's (synchronous) method receive is called when the Receiver is in asynchronous state, i.e when all PDUs received from the SMSC are passed to an instance of implementation of ServerPDUListener class.
    OutbindEvent
    Created when outbind pdu is received from smsc.
    OutbindEventListener
    Callback interface for Outbind requests received from SMSC.
    OutbindReceiver
    This class is for receiving outbind request from SMSC.
    ReceivedPDUEvent
    The base class for events representing receiving a pdu by receiver.
    Receiver
    Receiver is class used for receiving PDUs from SMSC.
    ReceiverBase
    Abstract base class for classes which can receive PDUs from connection.
    ServerPDUEvent
    Instance of this class is created and passed to the ServerPDUEventListener by the Receiver.
    ServerPDUEventListener
    The interface ServerPDUEventListener defines method for processing of PDUs received by the Receiver from the SMSC.
    Session
    Class Session provides all methods necessary for communication with SMSC using SMPP protocol, i.e. methods for sending PDUs as defined in SMPP specification as well as receiving responses for sent PDUs and waiting for PDUs whose sending was initiated by SMSC.
    SmppException
    Class SmppException is the root of all SMPP Library exceptions.
    SmppObject
    Class SmppObject is the root of the SMPP Library class hierarchy.
    TCPIPConnection
    Implementation of TCP/IP type of communication.
    TimeoutException
    Thrown when only a part of PDU was received and the rest of the PDU hasn't been received for too long time.
    Transmitter
    Class Transmitter transmits PDUs over connection.
    WrongSessionStateException
    Exception WrongSessionStateException is thrown if a Session's method which requires certain state of the session but the session is not in the state.
  • Classes in org.smpp used by org.smpp.pdu 
    Class and Description
    SmppException
    Class SmppException is the root of all SMPP Library exceptions.
    SmppObject
    Class SmppObject is the root of the SMPP Library class hierarchy.
  • Classes in org.smpp used by org.smpp.pdu.tlv 
    Class and Description
    SmppException
    Class SmppException is the root of all SMPP Library exceptions.
    SmppObject
    Class SmppObject is the root of the SMPP Library class hierarchy.
  • Classes in org.smpp used by org.smpp.util 
    Class and Description
    OutbindEvent
    Created when outbind pdu is received from smsc.
    OutbindEventListener
    Callback interface for Outbind requests received from SMSC.
    ServerPDUEvent
    Instance of this class is created and passed to the ServerPDUEventListener by the Receiver.
    ServerPDUEventListener
    The interface ServerPDUEventListener defines method for processing of PDUs received by the Receiver from the SMSC.
    SmppException
    Class SmppException is the root of all SMPP Library exceptions.
    SmppObject
    Class SmppObject is the root of the SMPP Library class hierarchy.
